case_title: United States of America v. Thompson
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Thompson

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 1 day SUPERVISED RELEASE: 5 years; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $100 RESTITUTION: $91,773.; JUDGMENT ON REVOCATION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE ENTERED 5/1/09; IMPRISONMENT: TIME SERVED; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 4 years; 10 months and 11 days; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $100; RESTITUTION: $91,773.00. REVOCATION OF SUPERVISED RELEASE AS OF 4/13/2011: IMPRISONMENT: 20 MONTHS; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 16 MONTHS; SPECIAL ASSESSMENT: $100; RESTITUTION: $91,723.00.
